queries.name: count_no_items
queries.query: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM c WHERE c.categoryId = 'NonExistentCategory'

queries.name: max_no_items
queries.query: SELECT VALUE MAX(c.price) FROM c WHERE c.categoryId = 'NonExistentCategory'

queries.name: min_no_items
queries.query: SELECT VALUE MIN(c.price) FROM c WHERE c.categoryId = 'NonExistentCategory'

queries.name: average_no_items
queries.query: SELECT VALUE AVG(c.price) FROM c WHERE c.categoryId = 'NonExistentCategory'

queries.name: sum_no_items
queries.query: SELECT VALUE SUM(c.price) FROM c WHERE c.categoryId = 'NonExistentCategory'
